short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay informed with real-time updates on nearby asteroids and safeguard your cosmic curiosity!ðŸ”­

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dive deep into the vastness of space without leaving your browser with "Asteroids - NeoWs." This extension is a must-have for every space enthusiast, offering real-time insights into near-Earth asteroids sourced directly from NASA's NeoWs service. Seamlessly integrating a user-friendly interface, it presents crucial details like the asteroid's name, its estimated diameter, velocity, and how close it's passing by Earth. What's more, each asteroid's name doubles as a link, directing you to NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory for a comprehensive breakdown. Whether you're an aspiring astronomer, a seasoned space buff, or someone intrigued by the mysteries of the universe, "Asteroids - NeoWs" ensures you're always in the know. Embrace the cosmos and keep track of the celestial wonders with ease!
